HeroSection.heading: Welcome to <1 /> <2>WorkingTitle</2>!
HeroSection.subHeading: Organize your tasks with ease. Create multiple lists, prioritize, mark as done, and drag-and-drop to reorder your tasks seamlessly.

cardOne.title: Organize by Priority
cardOne.body: Sort tasks by priority to focus on what matters most.

cardTwo.title: Drag-and-Drop
cardTwo.body: Reorder tasks quickly and intuitively with drag-and-drop.

cardThree.title: Multiple Lists
cardThree.body: Manage multiple lists for personal, work, and more.

cardFour.title: Mark as Done
cardFour.body: Keep track of completed tasks effortlessly.

CredentialsForm.errPassword: Password must be at least 12 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character: @$!%*?&.

Task.delTaskConf: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
